subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: When the hard-throwing rookie Stephen Strasburg takes on the Mets and the knuckleball pitcher R. A. Dickey on Saturday, it will be a contrast in styles, age, temperament and most everything else.
snippet: When the hard-throwing rookie Stephen Strasburg takes on the Mets and the knuckleball pitcher R. A. Dickey on Saturday, it will be a contrast in styles, age, temperament and most everything else.
